Get Result Value

Source: R/get_result.R
get_result.Rd

Get Result Value

get_result(study, result = NULL, analysis_id = 1)

Arguments

study

A study list object with class scivrs_study
result

The name of the result value to retrieve (omit to return all results)
analysis_id

The id for the relevant analysis (index or character) defaults to the first analysis in the list

Value

value of names result or list of results

Examples

s <- study() %>%
  add_hypothesis("H1", "Petals are wider than long") %>%
  add_analysis("A1", t.test(iris$Petal.Width, iris$Petal.Height)) %>%
  add_criterion("p", "p.value", "<", .05) %>%
  study_analyse()
#> Hypothesis H1, Criterion p:
#>     p.value < 0.05 is TRUE
#>     p.value = 0
#> Warning: Hypothesis H1 has no evaluation criteria for corroboration
#> Warning: Hypothesis H1 has no evaluation criteria for falsification
#> Hypothesis H1:
#>     Corroborate: FALSE
#>     Falsify: FALSE
#>     Conclusion: inconclusive

 get_result(s, "p.value", "A1")
#> [1] 2.659021e-42
